# portkey_integration_workspaces (Data Source)

Fetches workspace access configuration for a Portkey integration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Query workspace access for an integration
data "portkey_integration_workspaces" "openai" {
  integration_id = "openai-production"  # Integration slug or ID
}

# Total number of workspaces
output "openai_workspace_total" {
  value = data.portkey_integration_workspaces.openai.total
}

# All workspace access configurations
output "openai_workspace_access" {
  value = data.portkey_integration_workspaces.openai.workspaces
}

# Filter to only enabled workspaces
output "openai_enabled_workspaces" {
  value = [for ws in data.portkey_integration_workspaces.openai.workspaces : ws.id if ws.enabled]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `integration_id` (String) The integration slug or ID to query workspace access for.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Data source identifier (same as integration_id).
- `total` (Number) Total number of workspaces with access configuration.
- `workspaces` (Attributes List) List of workspace access configurations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--workspaces))

<a id="nestedatt--workspaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `workspaces`

Read-Only:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the integration is enabled for this workspace.
- `id` (String) Workspace identifier.
- `rate_limits` (Attributes List) Rate limits for this workspace. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--workspaces--rate_limits))
- `usage_limits` (Attributes List) Usage limits for this workspace. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--workspaces--usage_limits))

<a id="nestedatt--workspaces--rate_limits"></a>
### Nested Schema for `workspaces.rate_limits`

Read-Only:

- `type` (String) Type of rate limit: 'requests' or 'tokens'.
- `unit` (String) Rate limit unit: 'rpm', 'rph', or 'rpd'.
- `value` (Number) The rate limit value.

<a id="nestedatt--workspaces--usage_limits"></a>
### Nested Schema for `workspaces.usage_limits`

Read-Only:

- `alert_threshold` (Number) Alert threshold percentage (0-100).
- `credit_limit` (Number) The credit limit value.
- `periodic_reset` (String) When to reset the usage: 'monthly' or 'weekly'.
- `type` (String) Type of usage limit: 'cost' or 'tokens'.
